General.Name: Leyden SAIC y F
General.Description: Leyden S.A.I.C. y F. manufactures and sells capacitors in Argentina. It offers low voltage capacitors, fixed benches, automatic low voltage banks, controller relays, contactors, harmonic filters, and reactors; medium and high voltage capacitors, capacitor banks, harmonic filters, oil cut and vacuum capacitor wrenches, vacuum circuit breakers, and controls for medium voltage banks, as well as technical services. The company was founded in 1943 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
